nodes.text: Peter Sturgeon is an actor that was arranged to play a 'Crocker' (later canonically named as Saurins) in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars featuring sketches by John Mollo.
For unknown reasons, Sturgeon did not end up playing any of the Crockers in the final film; he was replaced by Barbara Frankland and an unknown actress (whom would later be replaced by Laurie Goode.
